item.title: Chang Yeol Ryu Travel Award
item.description: I am honored to receive the APS DPOLY Chang Yeol Ryu Travel Award, which supported my first trip to the APS Joint March & April Meeting Global Physics Summit, where I presented my work "Stretching Response of a Polymer Chain with Deformable Bonds."
item.content:encoded: I am honored to receive the APS DPOLY Chang Yeol Ryu Travel Award, which supported my first trip to the APS Joint March & April Meeting Global Physics Summit, where I presented my work "Stretching Response of a Polymer Chain with Deformable Bonds."
